## Debian/Ubuntu Quick Install

![Build Status](https://github.com/oichkatzelesfrettschen/endcord/actions/workflows/debian-repo.yml/badge.svg)

**This fork provides automated nightly Debian packages.** One-time setup, then `apt upgrade` handles the rest.

### Step 1: Add the signing key

```bash
wget -qO - https://oichkatzelesfrettschen.github.io/endcord/public.key | \
  sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/endcord-archive-keyring.gpg
```

### Step 2: Add the repository

```bash
echo "deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/endcord-archive-keyring.gpg arch=amd64] \
  https://oichkatzelesfrettschen.github.io/endcord/ stable main" | \
  sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/endcord.list
```

### Step 3: Install

```bash
sudo apt update && sudo apt install endcord
```

### Updates

Updates arrive automatically via `apt upgrade`. Packages rebuild nightly at 2:00 AM UTC.

### Note

This is an **unofficial community repack** - not affiliated with the official Endcord team.
We package [upstream releases](https://github.com/sparklost/endcord) for easier Debian installation.
